name: SPACESCAPE (itch) (maskarinec)
description:
SPACESCAPE is a game where you escape through the space in you spaceship. You must dodge planets, debris and other things. Thankfully you have the ability to slow down time, which helps you greatly in your quest.

Controls arrows move left and right spacebar toggle the slowdown arrows + enter navigate the menus Tutorial Planets and debris

Planets move around slightly and if you hit them, you die.

speed boosters

Speed boosters will speed you up two times for about a second. They can be useful to achieve higher scores faster, but they can also lead to your crash.

Rock monsters

Rock monsters fly through the top section of the screen and shoot a rocket at you when they are in about two thirds of the screen. You will always hear a warning sound before they appear.

Cargo + Cargo drop-offs

If you fly over a cargo, you will pick it up. If you then deliver it to a planet with a cargo drop-off platform, your charge capacity will be increased by 0.5 seconds and replenished.

The game was implemented in the tophat engine and the source code is available here
